EmailTemplate.name: GA12-001 - Potential problem with Microsoft Security patch MS11-030
EmailTemplate.subject: GA12-001 - Potential problem with Microsoft Security patch MS11-030
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're receiving this newsletter because of your relationship with TriTech Software Systems.
POSTED 01.18.12
GA12-001 - Potential problem with Microsoft Security patch MS11-030
Dear Clients,
The Technical Advisory GA12-001 - Potential problem with Microsoft Security patch MS11-030 has been posted to the MyVisiNet support site. In April 2011 Microsoft released 9 security updates, which were approved by TriTech through Technical Advisory GA11 – 012. One of these updates is MS11-030 addressing a vulnerability in DNS Resolution which could allow remote code execution. As a result of implementing this update, a few of our customers running Stratus servers have reported CAD slowness. Please read the full advisory for recommendations from TriTech regarding this issue.
You may access this advisory via the MyVisiNet Support site under Documentation | Tech Advisories | VisiNet Advisories | 2012 or by clicking on the link included in this email.
Sincerely,
Tony Vardiman Technical Services Frontline Supervisor | VisiNet Solutions TriTech Software Systems | tritech.com Direct: 858.799.7441 | Mobile: 619.816.7100 Fax: 858.799.7010 | Support: 800.847.4223 Support Website: myvisinet.tritech.com Read Full Article | Email Feedback
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego | CA | 92121
